name: tricky tides - godot wild jam 2022
description:
Made in one week for the godot wild jam 2022!

Play as the moon as you guide a ship through nine puzzling levels! Manipulate the tides to get the ship to the goal.

Make your own levels with the level editor! (VERY limited for jam submission)

CONTROLS (gameplay)

____________

A/D to move the moon

W/S to change gravitational pull

CONTROLS (editor)

___________________

LMB to place objects

RMB to destroy

TAB to hide the toolbar

CREDIT

________
